article_title: An Update On The Fiscal Showdown

article_metadata.description: Throughout the recent fiscal showdown in Washington, D.C., I’ve maintained that hating the government, though sometimes understandable, is not an investment strategy.
article_metadata.author: OppenheimerFunds
